message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,000,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to own it at a special price. My offer to you is $950,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive a remarkable deal while maximizing the value I receive for this valuable asset. I believe this proposal strikes a fair balance between our interests. I look forward to your positive response.
